name: Google logo deactivator on "New Tab" page
body:
### Welcome!
In Google Chrome 33, Instant Extended API removed from Flags page. So you can't disable annoying Google logo on New Tab page. This extension helps to fix it.

### Installation
1. Download the extension file from the website and save it to your computer.
2. Click the Chrome menu icon on the browser toolbar.
3. Select **Tools > Extensions**.
4. Locate the extension file on your computer and drag the file onto the Extensions page.
5. Review the list of permissions in the dialog that appears. If you would like to proceed, click **Install**.

### Support or Contact
Having troubles? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/StyleT/GLogo_deactivator or contact vlad.fedosov@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
